content.raw_text: From: no-reply@mlb.tv To: sneha_kapoor29@outlook.com Date: 2025-06-10 08:45:12 Dear Sneha Kapoor, Welcome to MLB.tv! Your subscription has been successfully activated. From: support@stream.mlb.com To: jane.doe@example.com Subject: Welcome to MLB.TV – Your Yearly Subscription Is Active! Date: Wed, 05 Mar 2025 09:12:44 -0500 Message-ID: <20250305-091244-001@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hi Jane, Thanks for joining MLB.TV! Your Yearly plan is now active. ──────────────────────────── Plan:        MLB.TV Yearly  Start date:  05-Mar-2025  Price:       USD 149.99  Card:        Visa •••• 0427 ──────────────────────────── Watch on any supported device and never miss a pitch. Questions? Visit our Help Center or reply to this email. Play ball! —The MLB.TV Team ──── This is an automated notification. Please do not reply to this message.

From: billing@stream.mlb.com To: chris.robinson@example.net Subject: Payment Receipt – MLB.TV Monthly (March 2025) Date: Sat, 01 Mar 2025 00:07:18 -0500 Message-ID: <20250301-000718-014@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hello Chris, Your payment for the March cycle was successful. ──────────────────────────── Subscription: MLB.TV Monthly  Billing date: 01-Mar-2025  Amount paid:  USD 24.99  Card ending:  6011  Invoice #:    73A6-E912-7F ──────────────────────────── You can download a PDF invoice from My Account → Billing History. Thanks for being part of MLB.TV. Regards, MLB.TV Billing Operations

From: alerts@stream.mlb.com To: alex.nguyen@example.org Subject: Action Required – Please Update Your Payment Method Date: Mon, 10 Mar 2025 16:32:09 +0000 Message-ID: <20250310-163209-020@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hi Alex, We were unable to process your recent MLB.TV payment because the card on file was declined. Next attempt: 13-Mar-2025  Amount due: USD 24.99 Please update your payment method before the next attempt to avoid service interruption: Account → Payment Settings → Update Card Need help? Chat with us anytime. —MLB.TV Account Services

From: team@stream.mlb.com To: maria.lopez@example.com Subject: Renewal Reminder – Your Annual Plan Renews April 2 Date: Tue, 18 Mar 2025 08:01:55 -0400 Message-ID: <20250318-080155-032@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hi Maria, Your MLB.TV Yearly subscription will renew on 02-Apr-2025 for USD 149.99 using your Mastercard •••• 1884. No action is needed if you wish to continue. To make changes or cancel, visit My Account before 01-Apr-2025 23:59 ET. We’re gearing up for Opening Day—see you then! Cheers, MLB.TV

From: trial@stream.mlb.com To: samir.patel@example.in Subject: Your Free Trial Ends Tomorrow – Keep Streaming Baseball Live Date: Fri, 21 Mar 2025 19:44:02 +0530 Message-ID: <20250321-194402-077@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hey Samir, Just a heads-up—your 7-day free trial ends on 22-Mar-2025 at 23:59 IST. Unless you cancel, we’ll automatically start your Monthly plan (USD 24.99) using card •••• 0923. Enjoy every game, every team—ad-free. Cancel anytime: My Account → Subscription. Play on, The MLB.TV Crew

From: billing@stream.mlb.com To: kelly.brown@example.co.uk Subject: Your Card Expires Soon – Don’t Miss a Game Date: Mon, 24 Mar 2025 11:22:10 +0000 Message-ID: <20250324-112210-088@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hello Kelly, We noticed that your Visa •••• 0045 on file expires 04/25. Please update your payment details by 31-Mar-2025 to ensure uninterrupted MLB.TV service. Update now → https://www.mlb.com/account/payment Thank you, MLB.TV Billing

From: cancellations@stream.mlb.com To: mark.sanchez@example.com Subject: Cancellation Confirmed – MLB.TV Subscription Date: Thu, 27 Mar 2025 14:18:33 -0700 Message-ID: <20250327-141833-099@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hi Mark, This email confirms that your MLB.TV Monthly subscription has been cancelled effective 27-Mar-2025. You’ll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period (31-Mar-2025). We hope you’ll be back next season. Take our quick survey and tell us why you left (takes 30 sec). Best regards, MLB.TV Retention Team

From: gifts@stream.mlb.com To: emily.hsu@example.sg Subject: Your Gift Subscription Has Been Redeemed – Enjoy MLB.TV! Date: Sun, 30 Mar 2025 07:45:59 +0800 Message-ID: <20250330-074559-104@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Congrats Emily! Gift code G9X-27T-BQ4 has been applied to your account. You now have MLB.TV Yearly access through 29-Mar-2026. Start streaming → https://www.mlb.com/tv/watch If you run into any issues, just reply to this email. Have a great season, MLB.TV Support

From: notify@stream.mlb.com To: david.lee@example.com Subject: Blackout Notice – LAD @ SD on April 4 Date: Wed, 02 Apr 2025 12:00:00 -0700 Message-ID: <20250402-120000-118@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hi David, Due to MLB blackout rules, the LAD vs SD game on 04-Apr-2025 at 6:40 PM PT will be unavailable in your local viewing area (ZIP 92101). All other out-of-market games remain available. Learn more about blackout restrictions → Thanks for understanding, MLB.TV Operations

From: account@stream.mlb.com To: olivia.martin@example.fr Subject: Account Suspended – Payment Failed Date: Fri, 04 Apr 2025 05:31:27 +0200 Message-ID: <20250404-053127-125@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Bonjour Olivia, Your MLB.TV service has been temporarily suspended because the payment on 04-Apr-2025 was declined. To restore access: 1. Sign in to mlb.com/account  2. Add a valid payment method  3. Click “Reactivate” Need assistance? Our support team is available 24/7. Merci, MLB.TV Billing

From: updates@stream.mlb.com To: liwei.chen@example.cn Subject: Price Update – MLB.TV Monthly Goes to USD 26.99 Date: Tue, 08 Apr 2025 10:14:09 +0800 Message-ID: <20250408-101409-132@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Dear Li Wei, Starting with your next billing cycle on 01-May-2025, the price of MLB.TV Monthly will change: Old price: USD 24.99 New price: USD 26.99 No action is required. If you do nothing, the new price will apply automatically. You may cancel anytime before 30-Apr-2025. Thank you for streaming with us. —MLB.TV

From: premium@stream.mlb.com To: lucas.moretti@example.it Subject: Upgrade Confirmed – You’re Now an MLB.TV Premium Member Date: Thu, 10 Apr 2025 13:22:11 +0200 Message-ID: <20250410-132211-140@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Ciao Lucas, Your upgrade to MLB.TV Premium is complete! Benefits unlocked: • Home & away broadcast feeds • 4-device simultaneous streaming • In-game DVR controls Charge today: EUR 54.99 (prorated) Next annual renewal: 09-Apr-2026 Enjoy the show, MLB.TV Premium Team

From: reactivate@stream.mlb.com To: hannah.green@example.ca Subject: Welcome Back – Your MLB.TV Service Is Restored Date: Mon, 14 Apr 2025 08:07:02 -0400 Message-ID: <20250414-080702-151@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hi Hannah, We’re excited to have you back! Your MLB.TV Monthly subscription is active again as of 14-Apr-2025. Need a refresher? Check out our new features guide → See you at first pitch! MLB.TV Fan Support

From: annual@stream.mlb.com To: raj.kapoor@example.com Subject: Auto-Renewal Successful – MLB.TV Yearly 2025-26 Date: Wed, 16 Apr 2025 22:09:41 +0530 Message-ID: <20250416-220941-164@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hi Raj, Your MLB.TV Yearly plan has renewed for the 2025-26 season. ──────────────────────────── Renewal date: 16-Apr-2025 Amount:       INR 12,299 Payment:      Card •••• 8842 ──────────────────────────── Thank you for staying with us. —MLB.TV India

From: student@stream.mlb.com To: lily.adams@example.edu Subject: Student Discount Approved – Save 35% on MLB.TV Date: Fri, 18 Apr 2025 15:00:00 -0400 Message-ID: <20250418-150000-173@mlb.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Hi Lily, Great news—your student verification is complete! Beginning with your next charge on 01-May-2025, you’ll receive 35 % off MLB.TV Monthly (now USD 17.54). Stay on top of the action (and your budget). Regards, MLB.TV Student Program
